overview: Lead designer for the creative development of large online and e-commerce projects,working along with the creative team to develop designs for various client projects,member of the recruitment team responsible for hiring new creative team members and training the new employees in the creative team.Responsible for branding with associated logos, collateral, trade show displays, print ads, packaging designs, and promotional pieces. Directed in-house and contracted creative talent. Accountable for achieving statistically successful and competitive web advertising campaigns
